data.description: A flexible loan that can be used for holidays, renovations, debt consolidation or a new toy to play with.
data.name: Standard Personal Loan Fixed

fees.name: Default fee - if payment remains outstanding after its due date
Heritage Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Heritage Cheque fee payable to Heritage if credit under this Credit Contract is provided by a cheque drawn by heritage on itself

fees.name: Special Request Transaction Listing Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever a listing of transactions between two given dates is issued on your account

fees.name: Redraw Administration Fee
fees.additionalValue: If you apply to redraw Payments in Advance other than a request through Online Redraw

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour fee
fees.additionalValue: If a direct debit authorised to be made from or to your account is dishonoured

fees.name: Capital reduction recalculation fee
fees.additionalInfo: If you ask Heritage to capitalise payments in advance or payment or proposed payment under the credit contract

fees.name: Document/Record search fee
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever Heritage provides a copy of  a document relating to your loan at your request or at the request of a security provider

fees.name: PPSR Search fee
fees.additionalInfo: When Heritage carries out a PPSR search on a motor vehicle subject to a security. Fee is charged per PPSR search.

fees.name: Enforcement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if we make good on a default under a security by performing a financial obligation (such as payment of an insurance premium or rates).

fees.name: Renegotiation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable each time you ask us to vary your credit contract or we offer a new credit contract to you.

fees.name: Collateral Security Preparation fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when taking security over a new Collateral Security Property (any security other than the first new security), on application.

fees.name: Change of term fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if you to ask us to agree or offer to change the loan term.

fees.name: Interest Recalculation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if you request us to make an interest recalculation on your loan.

fees.name: Telegraphic Transfer Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if money lent to you is telegraphically transferred within Australia.

fees.name: Approval request fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if you ask for our approval under the credit contract or a security in relation to a transaction or proposal

fees.name: Bank Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Cost payable to any bank issuing a bank cheque for settlement on 
 settlement of loan.

features.additionalInfo: Ability to make additional or lump sum payments
No Penalty for paying out early

features.additionalValue: Heritage Credits is Heritage's loyalty program

features.additionalInfo: Loan term of up to 7 years
Fixed repayments to make budgeting easy
Make unlimited extra repayments, repay in full at anytime

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Fixed term 1 to 7 years. Interest rates are on a per annum basis. Rates and discounts are correct as stated and subject to change without notice.Comparison rate is calculated on loans as follows: Standard Personal Loan - Fixed comparison rate is based on a loan of $30,000 borrowed for 5 years.  WARNING: This comparison rate is true only for the example given and may not include all fees and charges. Different terms, fees or other loan amounts might result in a different comparison rate.
